## Summary of Raw Data
Here is a summary of the Raw Data from the Rolling Sales for Manhattan

```{r summary}

readURL<-"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deshowa/manhattan_project/master/analysis/data/rollingsales_manhattan.csv"

#data.path <- paste("analysis/data/rollingsales_manhattan.csv",sep = "")
rollingsales.manhattan.df <- read.csv(file = readURL , header = TRUE)
summary(rollingsales.manhattan.df)
```
